frontmatter.title: Building Enterprise Computer Vision Systems: From Research to Production
frontmatter.description: Key architectural decisions and lessons learned from deploying face recognition and fish classification systems at scale in production environments.

frontmatter.title: Building Agentic AI Systems: From LLM Chains to Autonomous Policy Simulators
frontmatter.description: How we built an Agentic AI system for the Indonesian Ministry of Law to simulate and analyze the impact of new legal policies before enactment.
